#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int tw[4]={2,4,8,6},th[4]={3,9,7,1},fo[2]={4,6},se[4]={7,9,3,1},ei[4]={8,4,2,6},ni[2]={9,1};
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int m,r;
        unsigned long long int b, a;
        cin>>a>>b;
        if(b==0)cout<<"1";
        else
        {
        if(a%10==0||a%10==1||a%10==5||a%10==6)cout<<a%10;
        else if(a%10==2)
        {
            m=4;
            r=b%m;
            if(r==0)r=m;
            cout<<tw[r-1];
        }
        else if(a%10==3)
        {
            m=4;
            r=b%m;
            if(r==0)
                r=m;
            cout<<th[r-1];
        }
        else if(a%10==4)
        {
            m=2;
            r=b%m;
            if(r==0)
                r=m;
            cout<<fo[r-1];
        }
        else if(a%10==7)
        {
            m=4;
            r=b%m;
            if(r==0)
                r=m;
            cout<<se[r-1];
        }
        else if(a%10==8)
        {
            m=4;
            r=b%m;
            if(r==0)
                r=m;
            cout<<ei[r-1];
        }
        else if(a%10==9)
        {
            m=2;
            r=b%m;
            if(r==0)
                r=m;
            cout<<ni[r-1];
        }
    }
    cout<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
